TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件，以便提供从一个用户指定的值中指定单元格的类型的值的自定义值转换属性。Handle the event to provide custom value conversion from a user-specified value to a value in the type specified by the cell property. 当处理事件，可以自行转换该值，或者你可以自定义默认转换。When you handle the event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion. 例如，你可以将值转换使用单元格自行与你选择的类型转换器方法。For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell method with type converters of your choosing. 或者，可以让默认类型转换器分析值，但需要修改， ，和返回的对象的属性属性，使用该单元格初始化属性。Alternately, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the , , and properties of the object returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 当你自行转换该值时，替换初始的格式化值属性中指定单元格的类型的转换值属性。When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示，没有任何进一步分析是必要的设置属性`true`。To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the property to `true`. 事件处理程序完成后，如果是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或属性是`false`、分析使用的单元格与默认类型转换器方法。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is parsed using the cell method with default type converters. 此方法的默认实现分析值使用， ，和中传递的单元格样式属性。The default implementation of this method parses the value using the , , and properties of the cell style passed in. 如果值不等于，此值被分析使用中传递的属性和类型转换器。If the value is not equal to , the value is parsed using the property and the type converters passed in. 若要自定义显示的格式值的一个单元格值的转换，处理事件。To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以检查日期项的有效性。The following code example demonstrates using to check the validity of date entries. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取需要分析的单元格数据的列索引。

span.span: Gets the column index of the cell data that requires parsing.

value.span: 更改的单元格的列索引。

span.span: The column index of the cell that was changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取的索引属性。Use the property to obtain an index into the property of a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以发现更改的单元格是否日期列中。The following code example demonstrates using to discover if the changed cell is in the date column. summary.span: 获取或设置应用于编辑的单元格的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style applied to the edited cell.

value.span: 一个 ，表示正在编辑的单元格的当前样式。

span.span: A that represents the current style of the cell being edited.

value.span: 默认值为单元格的 属性的值。

span.span: The default value is the value of the cell property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于确定单元格所有有效的格式。You can use this property to determine the formatting in effect for the cell. 将此属性设置或更改此属性返回的对象的属性没有任何效果，除非是`false`事件处理程序退出时。Setting this property or changing the properties of the object that this property returns has no effect unless the is `false` when the event handler exits. 在这种情况下， ， ，和的单元格样式属性用于分析单元格的值。In this case, the , , and properties of the cell style are used to parse the cell value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#303](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#303)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#303](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#303)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已成功地对单元格的值进行分析。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a cell's value has been successfully parsed.

value.span: 如果已成功地对单元格的值进行了分析，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cell's value has been successfully parsed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A设置属性以指示是否已成功分析新单元格的值和任何进一步的转换是必需的。A sets the property to indicate whether the new cell value was successfully parsed and no further conversion is necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置到`true`单元格的值被成功地分析。The following code example sets to `true` when the cell's value is successfully parsed. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取的索引属性。Use the property to obtain an index into the property of a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
